page.title: 01** BROADCLYST VILLAGE **
page.content: Broadclyst is a small village 6 miles from Exeter.It has a lot of facilities including church,park,2 shops and 2 schools. We aren't by the sea but there are some beaches nearby.We are lucky in having only 2 main roads.One runs through the village,and the other runs round by the secondary school. The land around is used for crops and animals.There are more crops than animals. Broadclyst is beautiful,but spoilt by the water tower,though there are trees growing around it. The river Clyst is nice,but ruined in places where people have put their rubbish such as crisp packets,yoghurt cartons and biscuit wrappings. The type of housing in Broadclyst is red brick,white stone,pebble dash and cob cottages.
